headline: A Look at Celsius Holdings’s Valuation After $300 Million Share Buyback and Strong Q3 Results
summary: Celsius Holdings (CELH) just revealed a $300 million share repurchase plan, highlighting management’s clear confidence in the company’s financial footing and future. In addition, they shared strong third quarter results marked by higher profitability and noticeable debt reduction. See our latest analysis for Celsius Holdings. Momentum around Celsius Holdings has been anything but dull this year, with shares up 43% year-to-date despite pulling back 38% over the past month. Even with the recent...

headline: Kohl's Appoints Michael J. Bender as Chief Executive Officer
summary: MENOMONEE FALLS, Wis., November 24, 2025--Kohl’s Corporation ("Kohl’s" or the "Company") (NYSE: KSS) today announced its Board of Directors ("Board") has unanimously appointed Michael J. Bender as Chief Executive Officer, effective November 23, 2025. Mr. Bender has served as Interim Chief Executive Officer since May 1, 2025. Mr. Bender will continue to serve on the Company's Board.

content.title: Kohl's Appoints Michael J. Bender as Chief Executive Officer
content.summary: MENOMONEE FALLS, Wis., November 24, 2025--Kohl’s Corporation ("Kohl’s" or the "Company") (NYSE: KSS) today announced its Board of Directors ("Board") has unanimously appointed Michael J. Bender as Chief Executive Officer, effective November 23, 2025. Mr. Bender has served as Interim Chief Executive Officer since May 1, 2025. Mr. Bender will continue to serve on the Company's Board.

headline: Kohl's promotes interim CEO and 30-year retail veteran Michael J. Bender to be its permanent chief
summary: Kohl's has named its fourth CEO in as many years, attempting to staunch an extended sales slide.  The company named Michael Bender as its permanent CEO Monday, nearly seven months after he took over on an interim basis.  Bender replaced Ashley Buchanan who was fired in May after an internal investigation found that he had directed the company to do business with a vendor founded by someone with whom he had a personal relationship.
